explanation: [0-0] In a spacious living room, a golden retriever stands in front of a sofa, its front paws resting on the edge of the brown sofa, looking up. Beside it stands a man in a black T-shirt and khaki shorts, looking down at the golden retriever. The floor is light brown wood, with a white wine cabinet on the left. There are black and white subtitles at the bottom.
[0-2] The man in black talks, his right hand extends his index finger and points to the golden retriever, the golden retriever puts its front paws on the ground and stretches its head forward.
[0-2] The man in black talks, his right hand extends his index finger and points to the golden retriever, the golden retriever puts its front paws on the ground and stretches its head forward.

[2-8] Then the scene switches to the golden retriever, wearing a pink bathrobe and sunglasses, lying on the sofa with a remote control on it. A man in a black suit walks out from behind, holding a plate with a bowl of popcorn in his left hand and a glass of red wine with a strawberry on the rim in his right hand. The man in the suit walks up to the golden retriever, looks down at it, and the golden retriever looks up at him.
